Level 49
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 49
By Y.K. TAN on Sunday, May 30, 2004 - 10:27 pm:

Stage 49

This stage is easy, but need to be explained in great detail. Firstly, if the jell is not producing, rush up to the next level of metal blocks. If it is still there, you would have to abide with it/kill it, or whatever you want to do with it. Once you done that, box up and grab the key and head back down to the metal block level, remember not to touch either the joker of the reproducing jell.

Once down at the metal block level, you would have to go up and fight that joker. Once the joker goes to the right, box him in the right(I know it will destroy the box....) but either ways, box him in, while you see the jell at the top part? Box a box there, and once he's standing on it, destroy the box to kill it, but remember to box the joker after it destroy the box, so that the plan would not get screwed up when he returns.

After that, if your are fast enough, create a box, jump up to the ducken ledge and create a box as the ducken would shoot projectiles at you. Box beneath/left of you and go to the ending, still remembering to box your right to block off projectiles.

When all is done, dash to the left and win the stage when the top joker is not attacking.
